question: Which among the following was the first comet to be observed by a manned spacecraft?
explanation: Comet Kohoutek was first sighted on 7 March 1973 by Czech astronomer Lubo≈° Kohoutek. Kohoutek was observed by the crews of Skylab 4 and Soyuz 13; it thus became the first comet to be observed by a manned spacecraft. It is the first comet to be observed by a manned spacecraft.
